details.rules: Describe a Cube. It will be created by the Tower.
details.flavour: In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.

details.rules: Name a non-player character. They will be suddenly inspired to seek greatness. By next       session they will be incredibly powerful.
details.flavour: There was a light within us that few can see. One day it will shine through.

details.rules: Name a character not on the current map. They take 100 damage.
details.flavour: "I wish this guy would just die before we even showed up, that'd save us a lot of         time" - General Zardon
